description: Suddenly unemployed Chicago investment banker Nick Bellwith (Jesse Metcalfe) was less than thrilled when he wound up working at a Christmas tree lot. But that was before he met astronomy teacher and single mom Julie Gibbons (Autumn Reeser). The two hit it off, but Nick's unexpected link to Julie's crushing financial woes could put a swift end to their burgeoning relationship. Moving Hallmark Channel outing co-stars Clarke Peters, Anthony Bolognese, Yoshié Bancroft. 84 min. Widescreen; Soundtrack: English; Subtitles: English (SDH).
